general.name: Le P. H. Phuong
about: I am a final-year Computer Science student eager to start my career as an intern or fresher. With a strong foundation in business analysis and data-driven problem solving, I have hands-on experience in projects ranging from customer experience analytics to financial trend prediction using machine learning.

Skilled in Python, SQL, Tableau, and AI frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow, I am passionate about applying both analytical and technical skills to support business growth and explore innovative AI solutions.

resume.title: Business Analyst
resume.label: Business Analyst with strong requirement analysis and data-driven problem-solving skills, experienced in workflow optimization and customer insights.

projects.name: End-to-End Financial Risk Assessment System
projects.framework: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Power BI, DAX, SQL
projects.description: Simulated a comprehensive risk management workflow by processing 10,000+ loan records using Python and Machine Learning. Developed actionable insights via Power BI to forecast default risks, recommending strategies to potentially reduce bad debt exposure by 15%.
